Post acquisition, I run  product strategy, design and technical implementation for Checmarx's training line of business.

Acquired by Checkmarx (https://www.forbes.com/sites/adrianbridgwater/2017/07/26/playing-games-to-learn-code-checkmarx-acquires-codebashing/2/#6a57b1a53aca) I started Codebashing as a one man startup out of my apartment and grew it to 10+ employees and profitability in three months of founding. Customers include Microsoft, Fitbit, Sky and many other Fortune 500 companies. Raised venture capital, recruited executive team and single handedly developed the core training platform from scratch. Acquired by Checkmarx (www.checmarx.com) after 18 months of founding.
Head of Application Security & Product Risk Assessments (Fixed Income & FX)
recommendations: Felipe Moreno
Security Analytics at Bloomberg LP

Gyan and I worked together on several security initiatives as part of Markit Information Security team. Gyan brought to the team strong technical skills in security and varied experience in assessing the security of applications. He made important contributions to the different projects we worked together and was an important asset to the team, developing key relationships with developers and managers, performing difficult security application assessments and leading the integration of source code review into the SDLC.

summary: Flaneur. Founded 1st co acquired by @Checkmarx. 15+ yrs in information security. I started Codebashing as a one man startup out of my apartment and grew it to 10+ employees and profitability in three months of founding. Customers include Microsoft, Fitbit, Sky and many other Fortune 500 companies. Raised corporate venture capital,  conceptualised the idea of interactive cyber security training  and single handedly coded the entire platform  from scratch, built Dev & R&D  team, led targeted marketing campaigns (GoogleAd Words is for losers) that generated 90% of all revenue.Acquired by Checkmarx after 18 months of founding. Read more about the acquisition here: https://www.forbes.com/sites/adrianbridgwater/2017/07/26/playing-games-to-learn-code-checkmarx-acquires-codebashing/2/#6a57b1a53aca
